tidbits.title: Cultural Melting Pot
tidbits.description: Lebanon is a cultural melting pot, known for its diverse heritage, vibrant arts scene, and the coexistence of various religious and ethnic groups.

tidbits.title: Historical Landmarks
tidbits.description: The country boasts historical landmarks like Baalbek's ancient Roman ruins and Byblos, one of the oldest continuously inhabited cities.

tidbits.title: Cuisine and Hospitality
tidbits.description: Lebanese cuisine, including dishes like tabbouleh and kebabs, is renowned worldwide, reflecting the country's hospitality and culinary richness.
